statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, page_views FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, username, login_time, logout_time FROM user_behavior WHERE page_views > 10 ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM user_behavior GROUP BY behavior_type ORDER BY behavior_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE logout_time IS NOT NULL AND page_views < 5;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE username='john_doe' AND behavior_type='login' ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, page_views FROM user_behavior WHERE page_views > 100 ORDER BY page_views DESC, login_time ASC;
SELECT username, login_time, logout_time, page_views FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'login' OR behavior_type = 'logout';
SELECT user_id, username, login_time, logout_time, behavior_type, page_views FROM user_behavior WHERE login_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY login_time;
SELECT DISTINCT username, behavior_type FROM user_behavior WHERE page_views > 50 ORDER BY username ASC, behavior_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, behavior_pattern FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT session_id, behavior_pattern FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type = 'login';
SELECT detection_id, detection_timestamp FROM anomaly_detection WHERE user_id = 4;
SELECT user_id, username, session_id, behavior_pattern FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, behavior_pattern FROM user_behavior WHERE session_id = 100 ORDER BY behavior_pattern DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, session_id, behavior_pattern FROM user_behavior WHERE session_id IN (50, 60, 70) AND behavior_pattern LIKE '%login%';
SELECT user_id, anomaly_type, detection_timestamp FROM anomaly_detection ORDER BY detection_timestamp ASC;

SELECT user_id, username, detection_id, anomaly_type, detection_timestamp FROM user_behavior JOIN anomaly_detection ON user_behavior.user_id = anomaly_detection.user_id WHERE detection_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM login_sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS session_count FROM login_sessions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT MAX(detection_time) AS latest_detection FROM behavior_anomalies;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM login_sessions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(session_id) > 5;
SELECT user_id, MAX(detection_time) AS last_detection FROM behavior_anomalies GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY last_detection DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE behavior_profile ->> 'status' = 'active';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM login_history WHERE login_success = true;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE first_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT users.username, behavior_data.behavior_type, behavior_data.behavior_timestamp FROM users JOIN behavior_data ON users.user_id = behavior_data.user_id WHERE behavior_type = 'Suspicious';

SELECT users.username, login_history.login_timestamp, login_history.login_location, anomalies.anomaly_type FROM users JOIN login_history ON users.user_id = login_history.user_id JOIN behavior_data ON users.user_id = behavior_data.user_id JOIN anomalies ON behavior_data.data_id = anomalies.data_id ORDER BY login_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND email LIKE '%gmail%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profile WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT behavior_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM behavior_data ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM session_data WHERE end_time IS NULL ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profile ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'login' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM login_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY login_count DESC;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, b.behavior_type, b.behavior_timestamp FROM user_profile u JOIN behavior_data b ON u.user_id = b.user_id ORDER BY b.behavior_timestamp ASC;
